com.redhat.rhn.common.validator

Class NumericConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.common.validator.ParsedConstraint
      • com.redhat.rhn.common.validator.RequiredIfConstraint
        • com.redhat.rhn.common.validator.NumericConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constraint

    public class NumericConstraint
extends RequiredIfConstraint

    The Constraint class represents a single data constraint, including the data type, allowed values, and required ranges.
